text: Michael "Mike" Brodie (birth WGC), also known by the nickname of "Dandy" or "Badger", is an Irish rugby league footballer who played in the 2000s. He played at representative level for Ireland, and at club level in the Irish Elite League for the Treaty City Titans (in Limerick). ==References== ==External links== *Wales A 10 Ireland A 24 *(archived by web.archive.org) Treaty City Titans profile *photograph of Michael Brodie Category:Ireland national rugby league team players Category:Irish rugby league players Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Michael Brodie (rugby league)
